articles.author: Shaurya Tomer
articles.title: NASA: Double solar flare caused radio blackouts in Asia and Australia - HT Tech
articles.description: An eruption of a sunspot caused a radio blackout in Asia and Australia on April 25, NASA says. The sunspot triggered a double solar flare which disrupted radio communication in parts of Asia and Australia.
articles.content:

articles.title: Mother dies after fight with sons who have autism, depression - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): A mother of two died from head injuries following a fight with her sons who suffer from autism and major depression, a coroner's court heard.
